eye.title: Practice the 20-20-20 Rule
description: To reduce digital eye strain, look away from your screen every 20 minutes.
Focus on an object at least 20 feet (about 6 meters) away.
Hold your gaze for at least 20 seconds before returning to your screen.
Adjust your screen brightness and contrast to comfortable levels to reduce eye fatigue.
Blink frequently to keep your eyes moist and prevent dryness, especially in air-conditioned environments.

immunity.title: Boost Your Immunity Daily
description: Eat a variety of colorful fruits and vegetables to get essential vitamins and antioxidants.
Get at least 7 hours of sleep each night to help your immune system recover and function well.
Take a brisk walk or do light exercise for 20 minutes to improve circulation and immune response.
Drink enough water throughout the day to help flush out toxins and support immune cell function.
Try adding a slice of lemon or a bit of ginger to your water for an extra antioxidant boost.

one_changes.title: Swap Soda for Water
one_changes.description: Replace one sugary drink with water or unsweetened tea.

one_changes.title: 10-Minute Walk After Lunch
one_changes.description: A brisk post-meal walk improves blood sugar and mood.

one_changes.title: Add One Fruit
one_changes.description: Include one whole fruit today—keep it simple and consistent.

one_changes.title: Stand Up Every Hour
one_changes.description: Set a timer to stand and stretch for 1 minute every hour.

one_changes.title: Mindful Breathing Break
one_changes.description: Pause for 2 minutes and focus on slow, deep breaths.

one_changes.title: Replace Chips with Nuts
one_changes.description: Choose a handful of unsalted nuts instead of fried snacks.

physical.title: Plank Hold
physical.description: Hold a plank for 60–120 seconds. Keep core tight, avoid hip sag.

physical.title: 5-Minute Full-Body Stretch
physical.description: Neck, shoulders, hamstrings, calves, hips—slow, easy movements.

physical.title: Wall Sit Challenge
physical.description: Sit against a wall with knees at 90°. Hold for 1–2 minutes.

physical.title: Stair Climb
physical.description: Walk up and down stairs for 3 minutes. Focus on steady pace.

mental.title: Gratitude Note
mental.description: Write 3 things you’re grateful for today.

mental.title: Digital Detox
mental.description: Put your phone away for 10 minutes and observe your surroundings.

mental.title: Positive Affirmations
mental.description: Repeat 5 positive affirmations aloud or in writing.
